      • getFileExtension

        public static java.lang.String getFileExtension(Enums.CompressionType compression)
        Method for get the proper extension according to compression type.
        Parameters:
        compression - if null, it will cause an empty extension.
        Returns:
        extension as a String, if recognized, empty otherwise.

      • parseCompressionExtension

        public static Enums.CompressionType parseCompressionExtension(java.lang.String path,
                                              java.lang.String filename)
        Find a file on disk, and parse its extension to detect its compression type. If the file is not found, or the extension is not recognized, return null instead.
        Parameters:
        path -
        filename -
        Returns:
        the type of compression

      • parseCompressionExtension

        public static Enums.CompressionType parseCompressionExtension(java.lang.String filename)
        Parse the extension of a filename to detect its compression type. NO access to disk is performed.
        Parameters:
        filename -
        Returns:
        null if no extension is recognized

      • checkFileExistence

        public static Enums.CompressionType checkFileExistence(java.lang.String path,
                                       java.lang.String filename,
                                       Enums.CompressionType wanted)
        Find a file on disk, and check that it exists with a given compression type, or find it if no type is given. If required compression type and suffix do not match, return null. If they match, or only one is found, continue. Parse file actual extension to detect its compression type. If the file is not found, or the extension is not recognized, or is not the one we were looking for return null instead. Can throw RuntimeException if more files are found for the same basename.
        Parameters:
        path -
        filename -
        wanted - the compression we want, or null if unknown
        Returns:
        the compression type found, or null if file not found or not recognized.

      • cExtensionOfFileExists

        public static Enums.CompressionType cExtensionOfFileExists(java.lang.String path,
                                           java.lang.String filename)
        FIXME correct docs Method for retrieving the correct extension of a file on disk, depending on the compression methods;returns empty string if file is not found. Throws an Error() if several copies of the file exist with different extensions. TODO rewrite a bit to use the Enum.values() and a for on those TODO launch a subclass of RuntTime Exception instead
        Parameters:
        path -
        filename -
        Returns:
        the extension of the file on disk, if it exists.

      • extensionOfFileExists

        public static java.lang.String extensionOfFileExists(java.lang.String path,
                                     java.lang.String filename)
        Method for retrieving the correct extension of a file on disk, depending on the compression methods;returns empty string if file is not found. Throws an Error() if several copies of the file exist with different extensions. TODO rewrite a bit to use the Enum.values() and a for on those TODO launch a subclass of RuntTime Exception instead
        Parameters:

        filename -
        Returns:
        the String extension of the file on disk, if it exists, or null.
